crystalized.credits: Tubbo_ & The TubNet Team (some assets), Callum_Is_Bad, The Crystalized Team.
crystalized.lobby.chat.welcomemessage2: Crystalized is in an unfinished state, Expect bugs. If you find any bugs please report them to Crystalized's developers through the Discord.
crystalized.lobby.chat.clientwarning: We've detected you're using a client (eg, Feather Client) that is known to cause problems with Crystalized, We recommend using Fabric with Sodium + Iris for the best experience.
crystalized.lobby.litestrike.desc1: In this game you are separated into 2 teams, Breakers and Placers.
crystalized.lobby.litestrike.desc2: The Placers must place the bomb and defend it, and the Breakers must
crystalized.lobby.litestrike.desc3: either stop the Placers from placing the bomb or break the bomb.
crystalized.lobby.litestrike.desc4: Use the shop to buy Custom Swords, Bows, Crossbows and Items
crystalized.lobby.litestrike.credits: Oringinally based on TubNet's "Lightstrike", now remade and open-source!
crystalized.lobby.knockoff.desc1: Knock Players off. Unlike normal PVP, You have a percentage-based
crystalized.lobby.knockoff.desc2: damage system where the higher your percantage is, the more
crystalized.lobby.knockoff.dsec3: knockback you take. During gameplay the map will crumble with new
crystalized.lobby.knockoff.desc4: sections spawning, Powerups and Infinite Blocks are available
crystalized.lobby.knockoff.credits: Oringinally based on TubNet's "Knockout", now remade and open-source!
crystalized.lobby.queue.cancelled.player: Queue Canceled! A player has left the queue.
crystalized.lobby.queue.starting: There is enough players to start the game! You will be teleported soon.

crystalized.shardcore.app.profile.name: Profile
crystalized.shardcore.app.games.name: Games
crystalized.shardcore.app.party.name: Friends & Party
crystalized.shardcore.app.shop.name: Shardcore Shop
crystalized.shardcore.party.invite: Do you want to join this Party?
crystalized.game.knockoff.name: Knockoff
crystalized.game.knockoff.chat.eliminate: has been eliminated from the game
crystalized.game.litestrike.name: Litestrike
crystalized.game.litestrike.tutorial.pla: ɢᴏ ᴡɪᴛʜ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴛᴇᴀᴍ ᴀɴᴅ ᴘʟᴀᴄᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ʙᴏᴍʙ ᴀᴛ ᴏɴᴇ ᴏғ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴇsɪɢɴᴀᴛᴇᴅ ʙᴏᴍʙ sɪᴛᴇs!!
crystalized.game.litestrike.tutorial.bre: ᴋɪʟʟ ᴛʜᴇ Eɴᴇᴍʏ ᴛᴇᴀᴍ ᴀɴᴅ ᴘʀᴇᴠᴇɴᴛ ᴛʜᴇᴍ ғʀᴏᴍ ᴘʟᴀᴄɪɴɢ ᴛʜᴇ ʙᴏᴍʙ!
ɪғ ᴛʜᴇʏ ᴘʟᴀᴄᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ʙᴏᴍʙ, ʙʀᴇᴀᴋ ɪᴛ.
crystalized.game.crystalcrush.name: Crystal Crush
crystalized.game.crystalcrush.chat.tutor: Defend your Nexus, Collect resources and fight other teams. Last person standing wins!
crystalized.game.crystalcrush.chat.world: A world border will appear in one minute. Prepare yourself.
crystalized.game.crystalcrush.chat.nexus: Your Nexus Crystal is under attack!
crystalized.item.bomb.name: The Bomb!
crystalized.item.bomb.desc2: Hold Right Click on Terracotta to place
crystalized.item.nexusblock.name: Nexus Block
crystalized.item.nexusblock.desc: Nobody knows where this thing comes from but you have this at your disposal.
crystalized.item.nexusblock.desc2: It is said that this is the most powerful source of energy there is as of recently.
crystalized.item.dragonarrow.name: Dragon Arrow
crystalized.item.arrows.name: Arrows
crystalized.item.dragonarrow.desc: On impact, will create dragon's breath around the arrow that will damage players when they walk on it.
crystalized.item.explosivearrow.name: Explosive Arrow
crystalized.item.explosivearrow.desc: Will explode on impact. Amplified with Explosive Bow
crystalized.item.shardcore3.name: Shardcore Nexus 3
crystalized.item.shardcore3.desc: This handy device will help you around the lobby and this server!
crystalized.item.weakshard.name: Weak Shard
crystalized.item.stoneshard.name: Strong Shard
crystalized.item.nexusshard.name: Nexus Shard
crystalized.item.defuser.name: Defuser
crystalized.sword.stone.desc: Your starting Sword, you're gonna have to upgrade this at some point.
crystalized.sword.slime.name: Slime Sword
crystalized.sword.pufferfish.name: Pufferfish Sword
crystalized.sword.wind.name: Wind Knife
crystalized.sword.wind.desc: Dash ability: Right Click to Dash.
crystalized.crossbow.multi.name: Multi Crossbow
crystalized.crossbow.quickcharge.name: Quick Charge Crossbow
crystalized.crossbow.charged.name: Charged Crossbow
crystalized.crossbow.charged.desc: Replaces arrows with a lazer beam attack that hits players instantly!
crystalized.bow.marksman.name: Marksman Bow
crystalized.bow.explosive.name: Explosive Bow
crystalized.bow.ricochet.name: Ricochet Bow
crystalized.orb.boost.name: Boost Orb
crystalized.orb.boost.desc: Gives you a speed boost in whatever direction you're looking towards, can also left you up in the air.
crystalized.orb.bridge.name: Bridge Orb
crystalized.orb.bridge.desc: Makes a bridge in whatever direction you throw this at.
crystalized.orb.explosive.name: Explosive Orb
crystalized.orb.grappling.name: Grapple Orb
crystalized.orb.grappling.desc: Fire a grapple hook that will pull you towards wherever you throw this! Can also be used to drag players towards you.
crystalized.orb.healing.name: Healing Orb
crystalized.orb.knockout.name: Knockout Orb
crystalized.orb.knockout.desc: Launch a auto-targetting missile to target the nearist player.
crystalized.orb.poison.name: Poison Orb
crystalized.orb.winged.name: Winged Orb
crystalized.orb.winged.desc: Launches you to the sky! (Will give you an elytra which will replace your chestplace if applicable)
crystalized.totem.antiair.name: Anti-Air Totem
crystalized.totem.antiair.desc: Stops elytra movement within the Totem's radius.
crystalized.totem.cloud.name: Cloud Totem
crystalized.totem.defence.name: Defence Totem
crystalized.totem.healing.name: Healing Totem
crystalized.totem.healing.desc: Gives you regeneration within the Totem's radius.
crystalized.totem.launch.name: Launch Totem
crystalized.totem.launch.desc1: Launches players (including you) into the air within the Totem's radius
crystalized.totem.launch.desc2: (Will give you and other players an elytra which will replace your chestplace if applicable)
crystalized.totem.slime.name: Slime Totem
